name: Shipping by Machool
author: Machool

sections.description:
Connects WooCommerce to Machool to provide realtime shipping rates.

Compatibility

This plugin requires WooCommerce 8.4.0 or later.

Ship locally and globally

Set up a Machool account at app.machool.com to connect your WooCommerce store to the Machool platform, generate a new API key and you’re good to go!
sections.changelog:
2.0.4

  • Fix plugin settings link from appearing on all plugins.

2.0.3

  • Remove Machool from the service names returned as shipping options.

2.0.2

  • Fix plugin settings link

2.0.1

  • Fix file naming issue

2.0.0

  • Added support for WooCommerce 8.4.0
  • Added support for shipping zones
  • Added support for criteria based shipping rates within app.machool.com
  • Added support for shipping rates adjustments within app.machool.com
  • Added support for expected delivery date adjustments within app.machool.com
  • Made the connection between WooCommerce and Machool more robust
  • Removed dimension constraints for products

1.1.3

  • Fixes issues with negative dollar markup amounts.

1.1.2

  • Updated documentation for WordPress review proccess

1.1.1

  • Bug fixes.

1.1.0

  • Modified to work directly with WooCommerce shipping zones.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
